trans-unit.source: A socket associated with this channel
trans-unit.target: 与该通道相关的插座

trans-unit.source: A socket channel is created by invoking one of the open methods of this class. It is not possible to create a channel for an arbitrary, pre-existing socket. A newly-created socket channel is open but not yet connected. An attempt to invoke an I/O operation upon an unconnected channel will cause a NotYetConnectedException to be thrown. A socket channel can be connected by invoking its connect method; once connected, a socket channel remains connected until it is closed. Whether or not a socket channel is connected may be determined by invoking its isConnected method.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用此类的 open 方法之一来创建套接字通道。无法为任意现有的套接字创建通道。新建的套接字通道已打开，但尚未连接。尝试在未连接的通道上调用I / O操作将导致引发 NotYetConnectedException 。套接字通道可以通过调用其 connect 方法进行连接；连接后，套接字通道将保持连接状态，直到将其关闭。套接字通道是否已连接可以通过调用其 isConnected 方法来确定。

trans-unit.source: A socket channel is created by invoking one of the open methods of this class. It is not possible to create a channel for an arbitrary, pre-existing socket. A newly-created socket channel is open but not yet connected. An attempt to invoke an I/O operation upon an unconnected channel will cause a NotYetConnectedException to be thrown. A socket channel can be connected by invoking its connect method; once connected, a socket channel remains connected until it is closed. Whether or not a socket channel is connected may be determined by invoking its isConnected method.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用此类的 open 方法之一来创建套接字通道。无法为任意现有的套接字创建通道。新建的套接字通道已打开，但尚未连接。尝试在未连接的通道上调用I / O操作将导致引发 NotYetConnectedException 。套接字通道可以通过调用其 connect 方法进行连接；连接后，套接字通道将保持连接状态，直到关闭为止。套接字通道是否已连接可以通过调用其 isConnected 方法来确定。

trans-unit.source: A socket channel may be created and the process of establishing the link to the remote socket may be initiated via the connect method for later completion by the finishConnect method. Whether or not a connection operation is in progress may be determined by invoking the isConnectionPending method.
trans-unit.target: 可以创建一个套接字通道，并且可以通过 connect 方法启动建立到远程套接字的链接的过程，以便稍后通过 finishConnect 方法完成。可以通过调用 isConnectionPending 方法来确定是否正在进行连接操作。

trans-unit.source: A socket channel may be created and the process of establishing the link to the remote socket may be initiated via the connect method for later completion by the finishConnect method. Whether or not a connection operation is in progress may be determined by invoking the isConnectionPending method.
trans-unit.target: 可以创建一个套接字通道，并且可以通过 connect 方法启动建立到远程套接字的链接的过程，以便稍后通过 finishConnect 方法完成。可以通过调用 isConnectionPending 方法来确定是否正在进行连接操作。

trans-unit.target: 通过使用适当的 DataLine.Info 对象调用 Mixer 的 getLine 方法，可以从混合器获得源数据线。

trans-unit.source: A source data line is a data line to which data may be written.
trans-unit.target: 源数据线是指可以向其写入数据的数据线。

trans-unit.source: A source data line is a data line to which data may be written. It acts as a source to its mixer. An application writes audio bytes to a source data line, which handles the buffering of the bytes and delivers them to the mixer. The mixer may mix the samples with those from other sources and then deliver the mix to a target such as an output port (which may represent an audio output device on a sound card).
trans-unit.target: 源数据线是可以写入数据的数据线。它作为其混音器的源。应用程序将音频字节写入源数据线,源数据线处理字节的缓冲并将其传送给混音器。混音器可以将样本与其他来源的样本混合,然后将混合后的样本传送到一个目标,如输出端口(可以代表声卡上的音频输出设备)。

trans-unit.source: A source file can also be created to hold information about a package, including package annotations. To create a source file for a named package, have the name argument be the package's name followed by ".package-info"; to create a source file for an unnamed package, use "package-info".
trans-unit.target: 也可以创建源文件来保存有关软件包的信息，包括软件包批注。要为命名包创建源文件，请将 name 参数作为包的名称，后跟 ".package-info" ; 要为未命名的软件包创建源文件，请使用 "package-info" 。

trans-unit.source: A specialized Map implementation for use with enum type keys.
trans-unit.target: 与枚举类型键一起使用的特殊 Map 实现。

trans-unit.source: A specialized Map implementation for use with enum type keys. All of the keys in an enum map must come from a single enum type that is specified, explicitly or implicitly, when the map is created. Enum maps are represented internally as arrays. This representation is extremely compact and efficient.
trans-unit.target: 与枚举类型键一起使用的特殊 Map 实现。枚举映射中的所有键都必须来自创建映射时显式或隐式指定的单个枚举类型。枚举映射在内部表示为数组。这种表示非常紧凑和高效。

trans-unit.source: A specialized Set implementation for use with enum types.
trans-unit.target: 与枚举类型一起使用的专用 Set 实现。

trans-unit.source: A specialized Set implementation for use with enum types. All of the elements in an enum set must come from a single enum type that is specified, explicitly or implicitly, when the set is created. Enum sets are represented internally as bit vectors. This representation is extremely compact and efficient. The space and time performance of this class should be good enough to allow its use as a high-quality, typesafe alternative to traditional int-based "bit flags." Even bulk operations (such as containsAll and retainAll) should run very quickly if their argument is also an enum set.
trans-unit.target: 与枚举类型一起使用的专用 Set 实现。枚举集中的所有元素都必须来自创建该枚举集时显式或隐式指定的单个枚举类型。枚举集在内部表示为位向量。这种表示非常紧凑和高效。此类的空间和时间性能应足够好，以使其可以用作传统的基于 int 的“位标志” 的高质量，类型安全的替代方法。如果批量操作（例如 containsAll 和 retainAll ）的参数也是一个枚举集，它们也应该非常快速地运行。

trans-unit.source: A specialized check box that will cause other radio buttons in the same group to become unchecked when this one is checked.
trans-unit.target: 一个专门的复选框,当这个复选框被选中时,将导致同一组中的其他单选按钮被取消选中。

trans-unit.source: A specialized dialog that displays the files in the directory and lets the user select a file, browse a different directory, or specify a filename.
trans-unit.target: 一个专门的对话框,显示目录中的文件,让用户选择文件,浏览不同的目录,或指定文件名。

trans-unit.source: A specialized dialog that displays the files in the directory and lets the user select a file, browse a different directory, or specify a filename. May use the directory pane to show the contents of a directory.
trans-unit.target: 一个专门的对话框,显示目录中的文件,让用户选择文件、浏览不同的目录或指定文件名。可以使用目录窗格来显示目录的内容。

trans-unit.target: 一个专门的窗格,允许其子窗格以层的形式绘制,提供一种堆叠顺序。这通常是存放菜单栏的窗格,也是包含窗口中大部分视觉组件的窗格。

trans-unit.source: A specific exception type and its subclasses can be selected for exception events. Caught exceptions, uncaught exceptions, or both can be selected. Note, however, that at the time an exception is thrown, it is not always possible to determine whether it is truly caught. See ExceptionEvent.catchLocation() for details.
trans-unit.target: 可以为异常事件选择特定的异常类型及其子类。可以选择捕获的异常和/或未捕获的异常。但是请注意，在引发异常时，并非总是可以确定是否真正捕获了异常。有关详细信息，请参见 ExceptionEvent.catchLocation() 。

The purpose of this interface is to group (and provide type safety for) all canonicalization (C14N) parameter specifications. trans-unit.source: A stage of a possibly asynchronous computation, that performs an action or computes a value when another CompletionStage completes. A stage completes upon termination of its computation, but this may in turn trigger other dependent stages. The functionality defined in this interface takes only a few basic forms, which expand out to a larger set of methods to capture a range of usage styles:
trans-unit.target: 一个可能是异步计算的阶段,当另一个完成阶段完成时,该阶段执行一个动作或计算一个值。一个阶段在其计算终止时完成,但这可能会反过来触发其他依赖阶段。这个接口所定义的功能只有几种基本形式,而这些基本形式可以扩展到更大的方法集,以涵盖一系列的使用方式。

trans-unit.target: 通过以下步骤创建 BigDecimal 的标准规范字符串形式：首先，将 BigDecimal 的未缩放值的绝对值转换为以10为底的字符串，使用字符 '0' 到 '9' ，且不带前导零（除非其值为零，在这种情况下使用单个 '0' 字符）。

trans-unit.source: A state factory must implement the StateFactory interface. In addition, the factory class must be public and must have a public constructor that accepts no parameters. Note that in cases where the factory is in a named module then it must be in a package which is exported by that module to the java.naming module.

trans-unit.source: A static commonPool() is available and appropriate for most applications. The common pool is used by any ForkJoinTask that is not explicitly submitted to a specified pool. Using the common pool normally reduces resource usage (its threads are slowly reclaimed during periods of non-use, and reinstated upon subsequent use).

trans-unit.source: A static set of permissions can be bound to a ProtectionDomain when it is constructed; such permissions are granted to the domain regardless of the Policy in force. However, to support dynamic security policies, a ProtectionDomain can also be constructed such that it is dynamically mapped to a set of permissions by the current Policy whenever a permission is checked.
trans-unit.target: 在构建ProtectionDomain时,可以将一组静态的权限绑定到ProtectionDomain上;无论有效的Policy是什么,这种权限都会被授予该域。然而,为了支持动态的安全策略,也可以构建一个ProtectionDomain,每当检查一个权限时,它就会被当前的策略动态地映射到一组权限上。

trans-unit.source: A stream builder has a lifecycle, which starts in a building phase, during which elements can be added, and then transitions to a built phase, after which elements may not be added. The built phase begins begins when the build() method is called, which creates an ordered stream whose elements are the elements that were added to the stream builder, in the order they were added.

trans-unit.source: A stream implementation is permitted significant latitude in optimizing the computation of the result. For example, a stream implementation is free to elide operations (or entire stages) from a stream pipeline -- and therefore elide invocation of behavioral parameters -- if it can prove that it would not affect the result of the computation. This means that side-effects of behavioral parameters may not always be executed and should not be relied upon, unless otherwise specified (such as by the terminal operations forEach and forEachOrdered). (For a specific example of such an optimization, see the API note documented on the count() operation. For more detail, see the side-effects section of the stream package documentation.)
trans-unit.target: 流实现在优化结果的计算方面具有很大的自由度。例如，如果流实现可以证明不会影响计算结果，则可以从流管道中取消操作（或整个阶段），从而取消行为参数的调用。这意味着行为参数的副作用可能并不总是被执行，并且不应该被依赖，除非另有说明（例如，通过终端操作 forEach 和 forEachOrdered ）。 （有关这种优化的特定示例，请参见 count() 操作上记录的API注释。有关更多详细信息，请参见流包文档的副作用部分。）

trans-unit.source: A stream is a sequence of events and the way to interact with a stream is to register actions. The EventStream interface is not to be implemented and future versions of the JDK may prevent this completely.
trans-unit.target: 流是事件的序列，与流交互的方式是注册动作。该 EventStream 接口不被执行，在JDK的未来版本可能会阻止这种完全。

trans-unit.source: A stream of resource URL objects. If no resources could be found, the stream will be empty. Resources for which a URL cannot be constructed, are in a package that is not opened unconditionally, or access to the resource is denied by the security manager, will not be in the stream.
trans-unit.target: 资源 URL 对象的流。如果找不到资源，则流将为空。无法构造 URL 的资源，未无条件打开的包中的资源或安全管理器拒绝对该资源的访问，这些资源将不在流中。

trans-unit.source: A stream pipeline, like the "widgets" example above, can be viewed as a query on the stream source. Unless the source was explicitly designed for concurrent modification (such as a ConcurrentHashMap), unpredictable or erroneous behavior may result from modifying the stream source while it is being queried.
trans-unit.target: 像上面的“窗口小部件”示例一样，流管道可以视为对流源的查询。除非明确为并行修改而设计了源（例如 ConcurrentHashMap ），否则在查询流源时修改流源可能会导致不可预测或错误的行为。

trans-unit.source: A stream should be operated on (invoking an intermediate or terminal stream operation) only once. This rules out, for example, "forked" streams, where the same source feeds two or more pipelines, or multiple traversals of the same stream. A stream implementation may throw IllegalStateException if it detects that the stream is being reused. However, since some stream operations may return their receiver rather than a new stream object, it may not be possible to detect reuse in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 流只能操作一次（调用中间流或终端流操作）。例如，这排除了“分叉”流，其中相同的源馈送了两个或多个管道，或同一流的多次遍历。如果流实现检测到正在重用该流，则可能抛出 IllegalStateException 。但是，由于某些流操作可能返回其接收者而不是新的流对象，因此可能无法在所有情况下都检测到重用。

trans-unit.target: 表示时区缩写的字符串。该值将根据夏令时的需要进行调整。对于 long ， Long 和 Date ，使用的时区是此Java虚拟机实例的默认时区。Formatter的语言环境将取代参数的语言环境（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the abbreviation for the time zone. This value will be adjusted as necessary for Daylight Saving Time. trans-unit.source: A string representing the host operating system encoding.

trans-unit.source: A string representing the host operating system encoding. This will follow the conventions documented in RFC 2278: IANA Charset Registration Procedures except where historical names are returned for compatibility with previous versions of the Java platform. The value returned from method is valid only for the VM which returns it, for use in a DocFlavor. This is the charset for all the "HOST" pre-defined DocFlavors in the executing VM.
trans-unit.target: 代表主机操作系统编码的字符串。这将遵循RFC 2278：IANA字符集注册过程中记录的约定，但返回历史名称以与Java平台的早期版本兼容时除外。从method返回的值仅对返回它的VM有效，以用于 DocFlavor 中。这是执行VM中所有“ HOST”预定义 DocFlavors 的字符集。

trans-unit.source: A structural modification is any operation that adds or deletes one or more mappings or, in the case of access-ordered linked hash maps, affects iteration order. In insertion-ordered linked hash maps, merely changing the value associated with a key that is already contained in the map is not a structural modification. In access-ordered linked hash maps, merely querying the map with get is a structural modification. )
trans-unit.target: 结构修改是添加或删除一个或多个映射的任何操作，或者在访问排序的链接哈希映射的情况下，会影响迭代顺序。在插入顺序链接的哈希表中，仅更改与映射中已包含的键关联的值不是结构上的修改。在访问顺序链接的哈希映射中，仅使用 get 查询该映射是结构上的修改。）

trans-unit.source: A sub-interface, Temporal, extends this definition to one that also supports adjustment and manipulation on more complete temporal objects.
trans-unit.target: 子接口 Temporal 将此定义扩展到还支持对更完整的临时对象进行调整和操纵的定义。

trans-unit.source: A subclass extending the GSSManager abstract class may be implemented as a modular provider based layer that utilizes some well known service provider specification. The GSSManager API allows the application to set provider preferences on such an implementation. These methods also allow the implementation to throw a well-defined exception in case provider based configuration is not supported. Applications that expect to be portable should be aware of this and recover cleanly by catching the exception.
trans-unit.target: 扩展 GSSManager 抽象类的子类可以实现为利用一些众所周知的服务提供者规范的基于模块提供者的层。该 GSSManager API允许在这样一个实现应用程序设置提供商偏好。这些方法还允许实现在不支持基于提供程序的配置的情况下引发定义明确的异常。希望可移植的应用程序应该意识到这一点，并通过捕获异常来干净地恢复。

trans-unit.source: A subclass may choose its own localization mechanism, if so desired, by overriding the supplied implementations of getElementDescription and getAttributeDescription.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要，子类可以通过重写提供的 getElementDescription 和 getAttributeDescription 实现来选择自己的本地化机制。

trans-unit.source: A subclass must provide an implementation of this method.

trans-unit.source: A subclass of Applet should override this method if it has any operation that it wants to perform before it is destroyed. For example, an applet with threads would use the init method to create the threads and the destroy method to kill them.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Applet 的子类具有要在销毁它之前执行的任何操作，则应重写此方法。例如，具有线程的小程序将使用 init 方法创建线程，并使用 destroy 方法将其杀死。

trans-unit.source: A subclass of Applet should override this method if it has any operation that it wants to perform each time the Web page containing it is no longer visible. For example, an applet with animation might want to use the start method to resume animation, and the stop method to suspend the animation.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Applet 的子类在每次不再可见包含它的Web页面时都具有要执行的任何操作，则应重写此方法。例如，带有动画的applet可能希望使用 start 方法来恢复动画，而使用 stop 方法来暂停动画。

trans-unit.source: A subclass of Applet should override this method if it has any operation that it wants to perform each time the Web page containing it is visited. For example, an applet with animation might want to use the start method to resume animation, and the stop method to suspend the animation.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Applet 的子类具有要在每次访问包含它的Web页面时要执行的任何操作，则应重写此方法。例如，带有动画的applet可能希望使用 start 方法来恢复动画，而使用 stop 方法来暂停动画。

trans-unit.source: A subclass of Applet should override this method if it has initialization to perform. For example, an applet with threads would use the init method to create the threads and the destroy method to kill them.
trans-unit.target: 如果要执行初始化，则 Applet 的子类应重写此方法。例如，具有线程的小程序将使用 init 方法创建线程，并使用 destroy 方法将其杀死。

trans-unit.source: A subclass of the ICC_Profile class which represents profiles which meet the following criteria: the color space type of the profile is TYPE_GRAY and the profile includes the grayTRCTag and mediaWhitePointTag tags.
trans-unit.target: ICC_Profile类的一个子类,它代表符合以下标准的配置文件:配置文件的色彩空间类型是TYPE_GRAY,并且配置文件包括grayTRCTag和mediaWhitePointTag标签。

trans-unit.source: A subclass of the ICC_Profile class which represents profiles which meet the following criteria: the color space type of the profile is TYPE_GRAY and the profile includes the grayTRCTag and mediaWhitePointTag tags. Examples of this kind of profile are monochrome input profiles, monochrome display profiles, and monochrome output profiles. The getInstance methods in the ICC_Profile class will return an ICC_ProfileGray object when the above conditions are met. The advantage of this class is that it provides a lookup table that Java or native methods may be able to use directly to optimize color conversion in some cases.
trans-unit.target: ICC_Profile类的一个子类,它代表符合以下标准的配置文件:配置文件的色彩空间类型是TYPE_GRAY,并且配置文件包括grayTRCTag和mediaWhitePointTag标签。这种配置文件的例子有单色输入配置文件、单色显示配置文件和单色输出配置文件。当满足上述条件时,ICC_Profile类中的getInstance方法将返回一个ICC_ProfileGray对象。这个类的优点是它提供了一个查找表,在某些情况下,Java或本地方法可能会直接用来优化颜色转换。

trans-unit.source: A subclass overrides the log method and scans each incoming LogRecord and calls push if a record matches some desired criteria.
trans-unit.target: 子类将覆盖 log 方法，并扫描每个传入的 LogRecord 并在记录符合某些所需条件时调用 push 。

trans-unit.source: A subclass should avoid overriding the finalize method unless the subclass embeds non-heap resources that must be cleaned up before the instance is collected. Finalizer invocations are not automatically chained, unlike constructors. If a subclass overrides finalize it must invoke the superclass finalizer explicitly. To guard against exceptions prematurely terminating the finalize chain, the subclass should use a try-finally block to ensure super.finalize() is always invoked. For example,
trans-unit.target: 子类应避免覆盖 finalize 方法，除非该子类嵌入了必须在实例被收集之前清除的非堆资源。与构造函数不同，终结器调用不会自动链接。如果子类覆盖了 finalize ,则它必须显式调用超类finalizer。为了防止过早终止finalize链的异常，子类应使用 try-finally 块以确保始终调用 super.finalize() 。例如，

trans-unit.source: A subclass should override this method (as well as hashCode()) if it adds instance state that affects equality.
trans-unit.target: 如果子类添加了影响相等性的实例状态，则它应该重写此方法（以及 hashCode() ）。

trans-unit.source: A subclass should override this method (as well as hashCode()) if its instances are not all functionally equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 如果子类的实例在功能上并非全部等效，则子类应重写此方法（以及 hashCode() ）。

trans-unit.source: A subclass's implementation of this method may choose to throw an IOException if this input stream has been closed by invoking the close() method.
trans-unit.target: 如果已通过调用 close() 方法关闭了此输入流，则此方法的子类实现可以选择引发 IOException 。

trans-unit.source: A subpackage of a package named p is any package whose name begins with "p.". For example, javax.swing.text is a subpackage of javax.swing, and both java.util and java.lang.reflect are subpackages of java.
trans-unit.target: 包p的子包是名称以“ p. ” 开头的任何包。例如， javax.swing.text 中是的一个子包 javax.swing ，两者 java.util 和 java.lang.reflect 中是子包 java 。

trans-unit.source: A substring of this String object is compared to a substring of the argument other. The result is true if these substrings represent character sequences that are the same, ignoring case if and only if ignoreCase is true. The substring of this String object to be compared begins at index toffset and has length len. The substring of other to be compared begins at index ooffset and has length len. The result is false if and only if at least one of the following is true:
trans-unit.target: 将此 String 对象的子字符串与参数 other 的子字符串进行比较。如果这些子字符串表示相同的字符序列，则结果为 true ，并且仅当 ignoreCase 为true 时才忽略大小写。要比较的 String 对象的子字符串从索引 toffset 开始，长度为 len 。要比较的 other 的子字符串从索引 ooffset 开始，长度为 len 。当且仅当以下至少一项为真时，结果为 false ：

trans-unit.source: A substring of this String object is compared to a substring of the argument other. The result is true if these substrings represent identical character sequences. The substring of this String object to be compared begins at index toffset and has length len. The substring of other to be compared begins at index ooffset and has length len. The result is false if and only if at least one of the following is true:

trans-unit.source: A synchronization aid that allows a set of threads to all wait for each other to reach a common barrier point.
trans-unit.target: 一个同步辅助工具,允许一组线程都互相等待,以达到一个共同的障碍点。

trans-unit.source: A synchronization aid that allows a set of threads to all wait for each other to reach a common barrier point. CyclicBarriers are useful in programs involving a fixed sized party of threads that must occasionally wait for each other. The barrier is called cyclic because it can be re-used after the waiting threads are released.
trans-unit.target: 同步帮助，允许一组线程互相等待以到达一个公共的障碍点。CyclicBarriers在涉及固定大小的线程方的程序中很有用，该线程方有时必须互相等待。该屏障称为循环屏障，因为它可以在释放等待线程之后重新使用。

trans-unit.source: A synchronization aid that allows one or more threads to wait until a set of operations being performed in other threads completes.
trans-unit.target: 一个同步辅助工具,允许一个或多个线程等待其他线程中正在执行的一组操作完成。

trans-unit.source: A synchronization point at which threads can pair and swap elements within pairs.
trans-unit.target: 一个同步点,线程可以在同步点上进行配对,并在配对内交换元素。

trans-unit.source: A synchronization point at which threads can pair and swap elements within pairs. Each thread presents some object on entry to the exchange method, matches with a partner thread, and receives its partner's object on return. An Exchanger may be viewed as a bidirectional form of a SynchronousQueue. Exchangers may be useful in applications such as genetic algorithms and pipeline designs.
trans-unit.target: 线程可以配对并在配对中交换元素的同步点。每个线程在进入 exchange 方法时都会显示一些对象，与伙伴线程进行匹配，并在返回时接收其伙伴的对象。可以将Exchanger视为 SynchronousQueue 的双向形式。交换器可能在遗传算法和管道设计等应用中很有用。

trans-unit.source: A synchronization point at which threads can pair and swap elements within pairs. Each thread presents some object on entry to the exchange method, matches with a partner thread, and receives its partner's object on return. An Exchanger may be viewed as a bidirectional form of a SynchronousQueue. Exchangers may be useful in applications such as genetic algorithms and pipeline designs.
trans-unit.target: 线程可以配对并在配对中交换元素的同步点。每个线程在进入 exchange 方法时都会显示一些对象，与伙伴线程进行匹配，并在返回时接收其伙伴的对象。可以将Exchanger视为 SynchronousQueue 的双向形式。交换器可能在遗传算法和管道设计等应用中很有用。

trans-unit.source: A synchronization provider that can be used with a WebRowSet object, which is a rowset that can be written in XML format or read from XML format. The RIXMLProvider implementation does no checking at all for conflicts and simply writes any updated data in the WebRowSet object to the underlying data source. WebRowSet objects use this provider when they are dealing with XML data.
trans-unit.target: 可以与 WebRowSet 对象一起使用的同步提供程序，该对象是可以以XML格式写入或从XML格式读取的行集。该 RIXMLProvider 实施确实在所有的冲突，没有检查，只是在写任何更新的数据 WebRowSet 对象的基础数据源。 WebRowSet 对象在处理XML数据时使用此提供程序。

trans-unit.source: A synchronizer that may be exclusively owned by a thread.
trans-unit.target: 一个可能由线程独家拥有的同步器。

trans-unit.source: A synchronizer that may be exclusively owned by a thread. This class provides a basis for creating locks and related synchronizers that may entail a notion of ownership. The AbstractOwnableSynchronizer class itself does not manage or use this information. However, subclasses and tools may use appropriately maintained values to help control and monitor access and provide diagnostics.
trans-unit.target: 线程专有的同步器。此类为创建可能需要所有权概念的锁和相关的同步器提供了基础。该 AbstractOwnableSynchronizer 类本身不管理或使用该信息。但是，子类和工具可以使用适当维护的值来帮助控制和监视访问并提供诊断。

trans-unit.source: A system-wide CookieHandler that to used by the HTTP protocol handler can be registered by doing a CookieHandler.setDefault(CookieHandler). The currently registered CookieHandler can be retrieved by calling CookieHandler.getDefault(). For more information on HTTP state management, see RFC 2965: HTTP State Management Mechanism
trans-unit.target: 通过执行CookieHandler.setDefault（CookieHandler）可以注册HTTP协议处理程序要使用的系统范围的CookieHandler。可以通过调用CookieHandler.getDefault（）来检索当前注册的CookieHandler。有关HTTP状态管理的详细信息，请参阅RFC 2965：HTTP状态管理机制。

trans-unit.source: A system-wide CookieHandler to be used by the HTTP URL stream protocol handler can be registered by doing a CookieHandler.setDefault(CookieHandler). trans-unit.target: 可以通过执行CookieHandler.setDefault（CookieHandler）来注册HTTP URL流协议处理程序要使用的系统范围的CookieHandler 。可以通过调用CookieHandler.getDefault（）来检索当前注册的CookieHandler。有关HTTP状态管理的详细信息，请参阅RFC 2965：HTTP状态管理机制。

trans-unit.source: A thin wrapper around java.util.Date that allows the JDBC API to identify this as an SQL TIMESTAMP value.
trans-unit.target: 围绕 java.util.Date 的瘦包装器，该包装器允许JDBC API将其标识为SQL TIMESTAMP 值。

trans-unit.source: A thin wrapper around java.util.Date that allows the JDBC API to identify this as an SQL TIMESTAMP value. It adds the ability to hold the SQL TIMESTAMP fractional seconds value, by allowing the specification of fractional seconds to a precision of nanoseconds. A Timestamp also provides formatting and parsing operations to support the JDBC escape syntax for timestamp values.
trans-unit.target: 围绕 java.util.Date 的瘦包装器，该包装器允许JDBC API将其标识为SQL TIMESTAMP 值。通过允许小数秒的精度达到纳秒级，它增加了保存SQL TIMESTAMP 小数秒值的能力。时间戳记还提供格式化和解析操作，以支持时间戳记值的JDBC转义语法。

trans-unit.source: A thin wrapper around a millisecond value that allows JDBC to identify this as an SQL DATE value.
trans-unit.target: 毫秒值左右的精简包装器，它使JDBC可以将其标识为SQL DATE 值。

trans-unit.source: A thin wrapper around a millisecond value that allows JDBC to identify this as an SQL DATE value. A milliseconds value represents the number of milliseconds that have passed since January 1, 1970 00:00:00.000 GMT.
trans-unit.target: 毫秒值左右的精简包装器，它使JDBC可以将其标识为SQL DATE 值。毫秒值表示自格林威治标准时间1970年1月1日00：00：00.000起经过的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: A thin wrapper around the java.util.Date class that allows the JDBC API to identify this as an SQL TIME value.
trans-unit.target: 围绕 java.util.Date 类的瘦包装器，该包装器允许JDBC API将其标识为SQL TIME 值。

trans-unit.source: A thin wrapper around the java.util.Date class that allows the JDBC API to identify this as an SQL TIME value. The Time class adds formatting and parsing operations to support the JDBC escape syntax for time values.
trans-unit.target: 围绕 java.util.Date 类的瘦包装器，该包装器允许JDBC API将其标识为SQL TIME 值。将 Time 类添加格式化和解析操作以支持时间值的JDBC转义语法。

trans-unit.source: A thread blocked in one of the select() or select(long) methods may be interrupted by some other thread in one of three ways:

trans-unit.source: A thread can also wake up without being notified, interrupted, or timing out, a so-called
trans-unit.target: 一个线程也可以在不被通知、不被打断、不超时的情况下唤醒,这就是所谓的

trans-unit.source: A thread can be in only one state at a given point in time. These states are virtual machine states which do not reflect any operating system thread states.
trans-unit.target: 一个线程在一个给定的时间点上只能处于一种状态。这些状态是虚拟机状态,不反映任何操作系统线程状态。

trans-unit.source: A thread can take full control of how it responds to uncaught exceptions by having its uncaught exception handler explicitly set. If no such handler is set then the thread's ThreadGroup object acts as its handler.
trans-unit.target: 通过显式设置其未捕获的异常处理程序，线程可以完全控制其对未捕获的异常的响应方式。如果未设置此类处理程序，则线程的 ThreadGroup 对象将充当其处理程序。

trans-unit.source: A thread can wake up without being notified, interrupted, or timing out, a so-called spurious wakeup. While this will rarely occur in practice, applications must guard against it by testing for the condition that should have caused the thread to be awakened, and continuing to wait if the condition is not satisfied. See the example below.
trans-unit.target: 线程可以被唤醒，而不会被通知，中断或超时，即所谓的虚假唤醒。尽管在实践中这种情况很少发生，但是应用程序必须通过测试应该导致线程唤醒的条件来防范它，并在条件不满足时继续等待。请参见下面的示例。

trans-unit.source: A thread executing in the Java virtual machine is in this state.
trans-unit.target: 在Java虚拟机中执行的线程处于这种状态。

trans-unit.source: A thread from the thread factory's newThread method is set to be a daemon thread and started to process phantom reachable objects and invoke cleaning actions. On each call the thread factory must provide a Thread that is suitable for performing the cleaning actions.
trans-unit.target: 线程工厂的 newThread 方法中的一个 daemon thread 被设置为守护程序线程，并开始处理幻像可达对象并调用清理操作。在每次调用时， thread factory 必须提供一个适合执行清理操作的线程。

trans-unit.source: A thread group object from the target VM.
trans-unit.target: 来自目标虚拟机的线程组对象。

trans-unit.source: A thread group object from the target VM. A ThreadGroupReference is an ObjectReference with additional access to threadgroup-specific information from the target VM.
trans-unit.target: 来自目标VM的线程组对象。ThreadGroupReference是一个 ObjectReference ，可以从目标VM附加访问线程特定于信息的信息。

trans-unit.source: A thread group represents a set of threads.
trans-unit.target: 一个线程组代表一组线程。

trans-unit.source: A thread group represents a set of threads. In addition, a thread group can also include other thread groups. The thread groups form a tree in which every thread group except the initial thread group has a parent.
trans-unit.target: 一个线程组代表一组线程。此外,一个线程组还可以包括其他线程组。线程组形成一棵树,在这棵树中,除了初始线程组外,每个线程组都有一个父线程组。

trans-unit.source: A thread has a hold on a lock for each lock action that is not matched by an unlock action.
trans-unit.target: 一个线程对每一个锁的动作都有一个锁的保持,而这个锁的动作没有与解锁动作相匹配。

trans-unit.source: A thread in the waiting state is waiting for another thread to perform a particular action. For example, a thread that has called Object.wait() on an object is waiting for another thread to call Object.notify() or Object.notifyAll() on that object. A thread that has called Thread.join() is waiting for a specified thread to terminate.
trans-unit.target: 处于等待状态的线程正在等待另一个线程执行特定操作。例如，一个在对象上调用 Object.wait() 的线程正在等待另一个线程在该对象上调用 Object.notify() 或 Object.notifyAll() 。调用 Thread.join() 的线程正在等待指定的线程终止。

trans-unit.source: A thread interruption ignored because a thread was not alive at the time of the interrupt will be reflected by this method returning false.
trans-unit.target: 由于线程在中断发生时不存在而被忽略的线程中断,将通过本方法返回false来反映。

trans-unit.source: A thread is allowed to access information about its own thread group, but not to access information about its thread group's parent thread group or any other thread groups.
trans-unit.target: 一个线程允许访问自己线程组的信息,但不允许访问其线程组的父线程组或任何其他线程组的信息。

trans-unit.source: A thread managed by a ForkJoinPool, which executes ForkJoinTasks.
trans-unit.target: 由 ForkJoinPool 管理的线程，该线程执行 ForkJoinTask 。

trans-unit.source: A thread managed by a ForkJoinPool, which executes ForkJoinTasks. This class is subclassable solely for the sake of adding functionality -- there are no overridable methods dealing with scheduling or execution. However, you can override initialization and termination methods surrounding the main task processing loop. If you do create such a subclass, you will also need to supply a custom ForkJoinPool.ForkJoinWorkerThreadFactory to use it in a ForkJoinPool.
trans-unit.target: 由 ForkJoinPool 管理的线程，该线程执行 ForkJoinTask 。此类仅可为增加功能而被子类化-没有可用于调度或执行的可重写方法。但是，您可以覆盖主任务处理循环周围的初始化和终止方法。如果你创建这样的一个子类，您还需要提供定制 ForkJoinPool.ForkJoinWorkerThreadFactory 来使用它在 ForkJoinPool 。

trans-unit.source: A thread managed by a ForkJoinPool, which executes ForkJoinTasks. This class is subclassable solely for the sake of adding functionality -- there are no overridable methods dealing with scheduling or execution. However, you can override initialization and termination methods surrounding the main task processing loop. If you do create such a subclass, you will also need to supply a custom ForkJoinPool.ForkJoinWorkerThreadFactory to use it in a ForkJoinPool.
trans-unit.target: 由 ForkJoinPool 管理的线程，该线程执行 ForkJoinTask 。此类仅可为增加功能而被子类化-没有用于调度或执行的可重写方法。但是，您可以覆盖主任务处理循环周围的初始化和终止方法。如果你创建这样的一个子类，您还需要提供定制 ForkJoinPool.ForkJoinWorkerThreadFactory 来使用它在 ForkJoinPool 。

trans-unit.source: A thread object from the target VM.
trans-unit.target: 目标虚拟机的一个线程对象。

trans-unit.source: A thread object from the target VM. A ThreadReference is an ObjectReference with additional access to thread-specific information from the target VM.
trans-unit.target: 来自目标VM的线程对象。ThreadReference是一个 ObjectReference ，可以从目标VM附加访问线程特定的信息。

trans-unit.source: A thread state.
trans-unit.target: 一个线程状态。

trans-unit.source: A thread state. A thread can be in one of the following states:
trans-unit.target: 一个线程的状态。一个线程可以处于以下状态之一。

trans-unit.source: A thread that has exited is in this state.
trans-unit.target: 一个已经退出的线程就是这种状态。

trans-unit.source: A thread that has not yet started is in this state.
trans-unit.target: 一条尚未启动的线程就处于这种状态。

trans-unit.source: A thread that is blocked waiting for a monitor lock is in this state.
trans-unit.target: 一个被阻塞的线程在等待监视器锁的时候,就处于这种状态。

trans-unit.source: A thread that is waiting for another thread to perform an action for up to a specified waiting time is in this state.
trans-unit.target: 一个线程在指定的等待时间内等待另一个线程执行一个动作,就处于这种状态。

trans-unit.source: A thread that is waiting indefinitely for another thread to perform a particular action is in this state.
trans-unit.target: 一个线程正在无限期地等待另一个线程执行某个动作,就处于这种状态。

trans-unit.source: A thread that tries to acquire a fair read lock (non-reentrantly) will block if either the write lock is held, or there is a waiting writer thread. The thread will not acquire the read lock until after the oldest currently waiting writer thread has acquired and released the write lock. Of course, if a waiting writer abandons its wait, leaving one or more reader threads as the longest waiters in the queue with the write lock free, then those readers will be assigned the read lock.
trans-unit.target: 试图获取公平读锁的线程(非重入),如果写锁被持有,或者有一个等待的写线程,就会阻塞。在当前最老的等待写者线程获取并释放写锁之后,该线程才会获取读锁。当然,如果一个等待的写者线程放弃了它的等待,留下一个或多个读者线程作为队列中最长的等待者,而写锁是空闲的,那么这些读者将被分配到读锁。

trans-unit.source: A thread that tries to acquire a fair write lock (non-reentrantly) will block unless both the read lock and write lock are free (which implies there are no waiting threads). (Note that the non-blocking ReentrantReadWriteLock.ReadLock.tryLock() and ReentrantReadWriteLock.WriteLock.tryLock() methods do not honor this fair setting and will immediately acquire the lock if it is possible, regardless of waiting threads.)
trans-unit.target: 试图获取公平的写锁（非可重入）的线程将阻塞，除非读锁和写锁均是空闲的（这意味着没有等待的线程）。（请注意，非阻塞的 ReentrantReadWriteLock.ReadLock.tryLock() 和 ReentrantReadWriteLock.WriteLock.tryLock() 方法不遵循此公平设置，并且如果可能的话，将立即获取该锁定，而不管等待线程如何。）

trans-unit.source: A thread that tries to acquire a fair write lock (non-reentrantly) will block unless both the read lock and write lock are free (which implies there are no waiting threads). (Note that the non-blocking ReentrantReadWriteLock.ReadLock.tryLock() and ReentrantReadWriteLock.WriteLock.tryLock() methods do not honor this fair setting and will immediately acquire the lock if it is possible, regardless of waiting threads.)
trans-unit.target: 试图获取公平的写锁（非可重入）的线程将阻塞，除非读锁和写锁均是空闲的（这意味着没有等待的线程）。（请注意，非阻塞的 ReentrantReadWriteLock.ReadLock.tryLock() 和 ReentrantReadWriteLock.WriteLock.tryLock() 方法不遵循此公平设置，并且如果可能的话，将立即获取锁定，而不管等待线程如何。）

trans-unit.source: A thread-safe variant of ArrayList in which all mutative operations (add, set, and so on) are implemented by making a fresh copy of the underlying array.
trans-unit.target: ArrayList 的线程安全变体，其中所有可变操作（ add ， set 等）都通过对基础数组进行全新复制来实现。

trans-unit.source: A thread-safe, mutable sequence of characters.
trans-unit.target: 一个线程安全的、可更改的字符序列。

trans-unit.source: A thread-safe, mutable sequence of characters. A string buffer is like a String, but can be modified. At any point in time it contains some particular sequence of characters, but the length and content of the sequence can be changed through certain method calls.
trans-unit.target: 线程安全的可变字符序列。字符串缓冲区类似于 String ，但是可以修改。它在任何时间点都包含某些特定的字符序列，但是可以通过某些方法调用来更改序列的长度和内容。

trans-unit.source: A three-letter abbreviation of this locale's country.
trans-unit.target: 这个地方国家的三个字母缩写。

trans-unit.source: A three-letter abbreviation of this locale's language.
trans-unit.target: 这个地方语言的三个字母缩写。

trans-unit.source: A throwable contains a snapshot of the execution stack of its thread at the time it was created. It can also contain a message string that gives more information about the error. Over time, a throwable can suppress other throwables from being propagated. Finally, the throwable can also contain a
trans-unit.target: 一个throwable包含其创建时其线程的执行堆栈的快照。它还可以包含一个消息字符串，该字符串提供有关该错误的更多信息。随着时间的流逝，一个throwable可以抑制其他throwables的传播。最后，throwable还可以包含一个

trans-unit.source: A throwable contains a snapshot of the execution stack of its thread at the time it was created. It can also contain a message string that gives more information about the error. Over time, a throwable can suppress other throwables from being propagated. Finally, the throwable can also contain a

trans-unit.source: A tile is about to be updated (it is either about to be grabbed for writing, or it is being released from writing).
trans-unit.target: 一块瓦片即将更新(不是即将抢写,就是正在放写)。

trans-unit.source: A time with an offset from UTC/Greenwich in the ISO-8601 calendar system, such as 10:15:30+01:00.
trans-unit.target: 与ISO-8601日历系统中的UTC /格林威治时间偏移的时间，例如10：15：30 10:15:30+01:00 。

trans-unit.source: A time without a time-zone in the ISO-8601 calendar system, such as 10:15:30.
A time-based amount of time, such as '34.5 seconds'.
trans-unit.target: 一个以时间为基础的时间量,如'34.5秒'。

trans-unit.source: A time-zone ID, such as Europe/Paris.
trans-unit.target: 时区ID，例如 Europe/Paris 。

trans-unit.source: A time-zone can be invalid if it is deserialized in a Java Runtime which does not have the same rules loaded as the Java Runtime that stored it. In this case, calling this method will throw a ZoneRulesException.
trans-unit.target: 如果时区在Java Runtime中反序列化，则该时区没有与存储该时区的Java Runtime加载相同的规则。在这种情况下，调用此方法将抛出 ZoneRulesException 。

trans-unit.source: A time-zone offset from Greenwich/UTC, such as +02:00.
trans-unit.target: 与格林威治/ UTC的时区偏移量，例如 +02:00 。

trans-unit.source: A time-zone offset is the amount of time that a time-zone differs from Greenwich/UTC. This is usually a fixed number of hours and minutes.
trans-unit.target: 时区偏移是指一个时区与格林威治/UTC相差的时间。这通常是一个固定的小时和分钟数。

trans-unit.source: A timer task is not reusable. Once a task has been scheduled for execution on a Timer or cancelled, subsequent attempts to schedule it for execution will throw IllegalStateException.
trans-unit.target: 计时器任务不可重用。一旦计划将任务安排在 Timer 上执行或取消任务，随后对其进行安排以使其执行的尝试将抛出 IllegalStateException 。

trans-unit.source: A titled border UI resource.
trans-unit.target: 一个有标题的边框UI资源。

trans-unit.source: A token is returned by taking a substring of the string that was used to create the StringTokenizer object.
trans-unit.target: 通过获取用于创建 StringTokenizer 对象的字符串的子字符串来返回令牌。

trans-unit.source: A token representing a lock on a region of a file.
trans-unit.target: 代表一个文件区域的锁的标记。

trans-unit.source: A token representing the membership of an Internet Protocol (IP) multicast group.
trans-unit.target: 代表互联网协议(IP)多播组成员资格的令牌。

trans-unit.source: A token representing the registration
trans-unit.target: 代表注册的信物

trans-unit.source: A token representing the registration of a SelectableChannel with a Selector.
trans-unit.target: 表示 SelectableChannel 向 Selector 的注册的令牌。

trans-unit.source: A token representing the registration of a watchable object with a WatchService.
trans-unit.target: 表示可 watchable 对象向 WatchService 注册的令牌。

trans-unit.source: A token representing the registration of a channel with a selector
trans-unit.target: 代表用选择器注册通道的标记。

trans-unit.source: A token which can be used to unsubscribe this subscription.
trans-unit.target: 可以用于取消订阅此订阅的令牌。

trans-unit.source: A tool might use this information to determine if any options provided by a user are unrecognized by any processor, in which case it may wish to report a warning.
trans-unit.target: 一个工具可能会使用这些信息来确定用户提供的任何选项是否未被任何处理器识别,在这种情况下,它可能希望报告一个警告。

trans-unit.source: A tool, written in the Java Language, uses this API to attach to a target virtual machine (VM) and load its tool agent into the target VM. For example, a management console might have a management agent which it uses to obtain management information from instrumented objects in a Java virtual machine. If the management console is required to manage an application that is running in a virtual machine that does not include the management agent, then this API can be used to attach to the target VM and load the agent.
trans-unit.target: 用Java语言编写的工具使用该API连接到目标虚拟机(VM),并将其工具代理加载到目标VM中。例如,管理控制台可能有一个管理代理,它用来从Java虚拟机中的工具对象获取管理信息。如果管理控制台需要管理在不包括管理代理的虚拟机中运行的应用程序,那么可以使用该API附加到目标虚拟机并加载代理。

trans-unit.source: A toolbar-specific separator.
trans-unit.target: 工具栏专用分隔符。

trans-unit.source: A toolbar-specific separator. An object with dimension but no contents used to divide buttons on a tool bar into groups.
trans-unit.target: 工具栏专用的分隔符。一个有尺寸但没有内容的对象,用于将工具栏上的按钮分成若干组。

trans-unit.source: A top level window with a title bar, border, menu bar, etc.
trans-unit.target: 一个顶层窗口,有标题栏、边框、菜单栏等。

trans-unit.source: A top level window with a title bar, border, menu bar, etc. It is often used as the primary window for an application.
trans-unit.target: 带有标题栏、边框、菜单栏等的顶层窗口。它通常被用作应用程序的主要窗口。

trans-unit.source: A top level window with no title or border.
trans-unit.target: 一个没有标题和边框的顶层窗口。

trans-unit.source: A top level window with title bar and a border.
trans-unit.target: 一个带有标题栏和边框的顶层窗口。

trans-unit.source: A top level window with title bar and a border. A dialog is similar to a frame, but it has fewer properties and is often used as a secondary window for an application.
trans-unit.target: 一个带有标题栏和边框的顶层窗口。对话框类似于框架,但它的属性较少,通常作为应用程序的辅助窗口使用。

trans-unit.source: A top-level Spliterator should not report both CONCURRENT and IMMUTABLE, since they are mutually exclusive. Such a Spliterator is inconsistent and no guarantees can be made about any computation using that Spliterator. Sub-spliterators may report IMMUTABLE if additions or removals to the source are not reflected when traversing.
trans-unit.target: 顶级Spliterator不应报告 CONCURRENT 和 IMMUTABLE ，因为它们是互斥的。这样的分割器是不一致的，并且不能保证使用该分割器进行任何计算。如果遍历时未反映对源的添加或删除，则子拆分程序可能会报告 IMMUTABLE 。

trans-unit.source: A top-level Spliterator should not report both CONCURRENT and SIZED, since the finite size, if known, may change if the source is concurrently modified during traversal. Such a Spliterator is inconsistent and no guarantees can be made about any computation using that Spliterator. Sub-spliterators may report SIZED if the sub-split size is known and additions or removals to the source are not reflected when traversing.
trans-unit.target: 顶级分离器不应同时报告 CONCURRENT 和 SIZED ，因为如果在遍历期间同时修改源，则有限大小（如果已知）可能会更改。这样的分隔符是不一致的，并且不能保证使用该分隔符进行任何计算。如果已知子拆分的大小，并且遍历时未反映源的添加或删除，则子拆分器可能会报告 SIZED 。

trans-unit.source: A top-level type, not contained within another type.
trans-unit.target: 一个顶层类型,不包含在其他类型中。

trans-unit.source: A transaction branch took too long.
trans-unit.target: 一个交易分支花了太长时间。

trans-unit.source: A transformation is of the form:
trans-unit.target: 转变的形式是:

trans-unit.source: A transformer of class files.
trans-unit.target: 类文件的转化器。

trans-unit.source: A transformer of class files. An agent registers an implementation of this interface using the addTransformer method so that the transformer's transform method is invoked when classes are loaded, redefined, or retransformed. The implementation should override one of the transform methods defined here. Transformers are invoked before the class is defined by the Java virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: 类文件的转换器。代理使用 addTransformer 方法注册此接口的实现，以便在加载， redefined 或重新 retransformed 类时调用转换器的 transform 方法。该实现应覆盖此处定义的 transform 方法之一。在Java虚拟机定义类之前，将调用变压器。

trans-unit.source: A transition between two offsets caused by a discontinuity in the local time-line.
trans-unit.target: 由局部时间线的不连续性引起的两个偏移之间的过渡。

trans-unit.source: A transition between two offsets is normally the result of a daylight savings cutover. The discontinuity is normally a gap in spring and an overlap in autumn. ZoneOffsetTransition models the transition between the two offsets.
trans-unit.target: 两个偏移量之间的过渡通常是夏令时转换的结果。不连续通常是春季的间隙，而秋季是重叠的。 ZoneOffsetTransition 对两个偏移量之间的过渡进行建模。

trans-unit.source: A transition is used to model the cases of a Gap or Overlap. The Normal case will return null.
trans-unit.target: 过渡用于模拟Gap或Overlap的情况。正常情况下将返回空。

trans-unit.source: A translation origin for rendering and clipping coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 渲染和剪切坐标的转换原点。

trans-unit.source: A transparent parameter specification is obtained from an AlgorithmParameters object via a call to getParameterSpec, and a byte encoding of the parameters is obtained via a call to getEncoded.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用 getParameterSpec 从 AlgorithmParameters 对象获得透明的参数规范，并通过调用 getEncoded 获得参数的字节编码。

trans-unit.source: A transparent stream that updates the associated message digest using the bits going through the stream.
trans-unit.target: 一个透明的流,使用流中的比特更新相关的消息摘要。

trans-unit.source: A transport service can be used to initiate a connection to a target VM. This is done by invoking the attach(java.lang.String, long, long) method. Alternatively, a transport service can listen and accept connections initiated by a target VM. This is done by invoking the startListening(String) method to put the transport into listen mode. Then the accept(com.sun.jdi.connect.spi.TransportService.ListenKey, long, long) method is used to accept a connection initiated by a target VM.
trans-unit.target: 传输服务可用于启动与目标VM的连接。这是通过调用 attach(java.lang.String, long, long) 方法来完成的。或者，传输服务可以侦听和接受目标VM发起的连接。这是通过调用 startListening(String) 方法将传输置于侦听模式来完成的。然后， accept(com.sun.jdi.connect.spi.TransportService.ListenKey, long, long) 方法用于接受目标VM启动的连接。

trans-unit.source: A transport service for connections between a debugger and a target VM.
trans-unit.target: 调试器和目标虚拟机之间连接的传输服务。

trans-unit.source: A transport service is a concrete subclass of this class that has a zero-argument constructor and implements the abstract methods specified below. It is the underlying service used by a Transport for connections between a debugger and a target VM.
trans-unit.target: 传输服务是此类的具体子类，它具有零参数构造函数并实现下面指定的抽象方法。它是 Transport 用来在调试器和目标VM之间建立连接的基础服务。

trans-unit.source: A transport service is used to establish a connection between a debugger and a target VM, and to transport Java Debug Wire Protocol (JDWP) packets over an underlying communication protocol. In essence a transport service implementation binds JDWP (as specified in the JDWP specification) to an underlying communication protocol. A transport service implementation provides a reliable JDWP packet transportation service. JDWP packets are sent to and from the target VM without duplication or data loss. A transport service implementation may be based on an underlying communication protocol that is reliable or unreliable. If the underlying communication protocol is reliable then the transport service implementation may be relatively simple and may only need to transport JDWP packets as payloads of the underlying communication protocol. In the case of an unreliable communication protocol the transport service implementation may include additional protocol support in order to ensure that packets are not duplicated and that there is no data loss. The details of such protocols are specific to the implementation but may involve techniques such as the
trans-unit.target: 传输服务用于在调试器和目标VM之间建立连接，并通过基础通信协议传输Java调试线协议（JDWP）数据包。本质上，传输服务实现绑定JDWP（如JDWP规范中所指定））到基础通信协议。传输服务实现提供了可靠的JDWP数据包传输服务。 JDWP数据包发送到目标VM或从目标VM发送，而没有重复或数据丢失。传输服务实现可以基于可靠或不可靠的基础通信协议。如果基础通信协议可靠，则传输服务实现可能相对简单，并且可能仅需要传输JDWP数据包作为基础通信协议的有效载荷。在通信协议不可靠的情况下，传输服务实现可能包括其他协议支持，以确保不重复发送数据包并且不丢失数据。此类协议的细节特定于实现，但可能涉及诸如

trans-unit.source: A tree node may have at most one parent and 0 or more children. DefaultMutableTreeNode provides operations for examining and modifying a node's parent and children and also operations for examining the tree that the node is a part of. A node's tree is the set of all nodes that can be reached by starting at the node and following all the possible links to parents and children. A node with no parent is the root of its tree; a node with no children is a leaf. A tree may consist of many subtrees, each node acting as the root for its own subtree.
trans-unit.target: 一棵树节点最多可以有一个父节点和0个或多个子节点。 DefaultMutableTreeNode 提供用于检查和修改节点的父级和子级的操作，还提供用于检查该节点所属的树的操作。节点树是所有节点的集合，可以通过从该节点开始并遵循所有可能的到父级和子级链接的方式来访问。没有父节点的节点是其树的根。没有孩子的节点就是叶子。一棵树可能由许多子树组成，每个节点充当其自己的子树的根。

trans-unit.target: 一个树节点,用来声明一个类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A two-dimensional size attribute's X and Y dimension values are stored internally as integers in units of micrometers (µm), where 1 micrometer = 10-6 meter = 1/1000 millimeter = 1/25400 inch. This permits dimensions to be represented exactly to a precision of 1/1000 mm (= 1 µm) or 1/100 inch (= 254 µm). If fractional inches are expressed in negative powers of two, this permits dimensions to be represented exactly to a precision of 1/8 inch (= 3175 µm) but not 1/16 inch (because 1/16 inch does not equal an integral number of µm).
trans-unit.target: 二维尺寸属性的 X 和 Y 尺寸值在内部以整数单位存储，以微米（µm）为单位，其中1微米= 10 -6米= 1/1000毫米= 1/25400英寸。这样就可以精确地将尺寸表示为精度为1/1000毫米（= 1 µm）或1/100英寸（= 254 µm）。如果小数英寸用2的负幂表示，则允许尺寸精确地表示为1/8英寸（= 3175 µm）的精度，而不是1/16英寸的精度（因为1/16英寸不等于1的整数）。微米）。

trans-unit.source: A two-dimensional size attribute's X and Y dimension values are stored internally as integers in units of micrometers (µm), where 1 micrometer = 10<sup>-6</sup> meter = 1/1000 millimeter = 1/25400 inch. This permits dimensions to be represented exactly to a precision of 1/1000 mm (= 1 µm) or 1/100 inch (= 254 µm). If fractional inches are expressed in negative powers of two, this permits dimensions to be represented exactly to a precision of 1/8 inch (= 3175 µm) but not 1/16 inch (because 1/16 inch does not equal an integral number of µm).
trans-unit.target: 二维尺寸属性的X和Y尺寸值在内部以整数单位存储，以微米（µm）为单位，其中1微米= 10 <sup>-6</sup>米= 1/1000毫米= 1/25400英寸。这样就可以精确地将尺寸表示为精度为1/1000毫米（= 1 µm）或1/100英寸（= 254 µm）。如果小数英寸用2的负幂表示，则可以精确地将尺寸表示为1/8英寸（= 3175 µm）的精度，而不是1/16英寸（因为1/16英寸不等于整数）。微米）。

trans-unit.source: A two-dimensional size attribute's value consists of two items, the X dimension and the Y dimension. A two-dimensional size attribute may be constructed by supplying the two values and indicating the units in which the values are measured. Methods are provided to return a two-dimensional size attribute's values, indicating the units in which the values are to be returned. The two most common size units are inches (in) and millimeters (mm), and exported constants INCH and MM are provided for indicating those units.

trans-unit.source: A two-dimensional size attribute's value consists of two items, the X dimension and the Y dimension. trans-unit.source: A user for this interface is commonly a tool that needs to discover how to deal with the underlying DBMS. This is especially true for applications that are intended to be used with more than one DBMS. For example, a tool might use the method getTypeInfo to find out what data types can be used in a CREATE TABLE statement. Or a user might call the method supportsCorrelatedSubqueries to see if it is possible to use a correlated subquery or supportsBatchUpdates to see if it is possible to use batch updates.
trans-unit.target: 该界面的用户通常是一种工具，需要发现如何处理基础DBMS。对于打算与多个DBMS一起使用的应用程序尤其如此。例如，某个工具可能使用 getTypeInfo 方法来找出可以在 CREATE TABLE 语句中使用的数据类型。或者用户可以调用方法 supportsCorrelatedSubqueries 来查看是否可以使用相关子查询，或者可以调用 supportsBatchUpdates 来查看是否可以使用批处理更新。

trans-unit.target: 考虑到提供的 ImageReadParam 中的任何源区域和子采样偏移设置，读者可以使用该实用程序方法来计算应读取的源图像区域。

trans-unit.source: A utility method that may be used by readers to compute the region of the source image that should be read, taking into account any source region and subsampling offset settings in the supplied ImageReadParam. The actual subsampling factors, destination size, and destination offset are not taken into consideration, thus further clipping must take place. The computeRegions method performs all necessary clipping.
trans-unit.target: 考虑到提供的 ImageReadParam 中的任何源区域和子采样偏移设置，读者可以使用该实用程序方法来计算应读取的源图像区域。没有考虑实际的二次采样因子，目标大小和目标偏移，因此必须进行进一步的削波。该 computeRegions 方法执行所有必要的削波。

trans-unit.source: A utility method that may be used by readers to compute the region of the source image that should be read, taking into account any source region and subsampling offset settings in the supplied ImageReadParam. The actual subsampling factors, destination size, and destination offset are not taken into consideration, thus further clipping must take place. The computeRegions method performs all necessary clipping.
trans-unit.target: 考虑到提供的 ImageReadParam 中的任何源区域和子采样偏移设置，读者可以使用该实用程序方法来计算应读取的源图像区域。没有考虑实际的二次采样因子，目标大小和目标偏移，因此必须进行进一步的削波。该 computeRegions 方法执行所有必要的削波。

trans-unit.source: A utility method that may be used by readers to test the validity of the source and destination band settings of an ImageReadParam.
trans-unit.target: 读者可以用来测试 ImageReadParam 的源波段和目标波段设置的有效性的实用方法。

trans-unit.source: A utility method that may be used by readers to test the validity of the source and destination band settings of an ImageReadParam. This method may be called as soon as the reader knows both the number of bands of the source image as it exists in the input stream, and the number of bands of the destination image that being written.
trans-unit.target: 读者可以用来测试 ImageReadParam 的源波段和目标波段设置的有效性的实用方法。一旦读者知道输入流中存在的源图像的带数和正在写入的目标图像的带数，就可以调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: A utility method to return a tree of IIOMetadataNodes representing the metadata contained within this object according to the conventions of the standard javax_imageio_1.0 metadata format.
trans-unit.target: 一种实用程序方法，用于根据标准 javax_imageio_1.0 元数据格式的约定，返回表示该对象中包含的元数据的 IIOMetadataNode 的树。

trans-unit.source: A utility method to test if this Oid value is contained within the supplied Oid array.
trans-unit.target: 一个实用方法,用于测试该Oid值是否包含在所提供的Oid数组中。

trans-unit.source: A utility method used by the event listeners.
trans-unit.target: 事件监听器使用的一种实用方法。

trans-unit.source: A utility method used by the event listeners. Given a mouse event, it changes the list selection to the list item below the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 事件监听器使用的一种实用方法。给定一个鼠标事件,它将列表选择改为鼠标下方的列表项。

trans-unit.source: A valid InputSource reference, or null.
trans-unit.target: 一个有效的InputSource引用,或为空。

trans-unit.source: A valid XMLReader or XMLFilter reference, or null.
trans-unit.target: 一个有效的XMLReader或XMLFilter引用,或者为空。

trans-unit.source: A valid non-null instance of a Transformer.
trans-unit.target: 一个有效的变压器的非空实例。

trans-unit.source: A valid port value is between 0 and 65535. A port number of zero will let the system pick up an ephemeral port in a bind operation.
trans-unit.target: 有效的端口值在0到65535之间。端口号 zero 将使系统可以在 bind 操作中使用临时端口。

trans-unit.source: A valid trailing decimal field is always interpreted as the pointsize. Therefore a fontname containing a trailing decimal value should not be used in the fontname only form.
trans-unit.target: 一个有效的小数点后面的字段总是被解释为点数大小。因此,一个包含小数点后的字体名不应该在仅字体名的形式中使用。

trans-unit.source: A validator enforces/checks the set of constraints this object represents.
trans-unit.target: 验证器强制执行/检查该对象所代表的约束条件集。

trans-unit.source: A validator may modify the SAX event stream (for example by adding default values that were missing in documents), and a parser is responsible to make sure that the application will receive those modified event stream.
trans-unit.target: 验证器可能会修改SAX事件流(例如添加文档中缺少的默认值),而解析器则负责确保应用程序将收到这些修改后的事件流。

trans-unit.source: A validator may modify the outcome of a parse (for example by adding default values that were missing in documents), and a parser is responsible to make sure that the application will receive modified DOM trees.
trans-unit.target: 验证器可能会修改解析的结果(例如增加文档中缺失的默认值),而解析器则负责确保应用程序将收到修改后的DOM树。

trans-unit.source: A validator object is not thread-safe and not reentrant. In other words, it is the application's responsibility to make sure that one Validator object is not used from more than one thread at any given time, and while the validate method is invoked, applications may not recursively call the validate method.
trans-unit.target: 验证器对象不是线程安全的，也不是可重入的。换句话说，确保在任何给定时间不从多个线程使用一个 Validator 对象是应用程序的责任，并且在调用 validate 方法时，应用程序可能不会递归地调用 validate 方法。

trans-unit.source: A value for the selectionMode property: select one contiguous range of indices at a time.
trans-unit.target: 选择模式属性的一个值:每次选择一个连续的指数范围。

trans-unit.source: A value for the selectionMode property: select one list index at a time.
trans-unit.target: 选择模式属性的一个值:每次选择一个列表索引。

trans-unit.source: A value for the selectionMode property: select one or more contiguous ranges of indices at a time.
trans-unit.target: 选择模式(selectionMode)属性的值:每次选择一个或多个连续的指数范围。

trans-unit.source: A value greater than 1 is associated with a later era, beginning with Heisei (2).
trans-unit.target: 从Heisei（ 2 ）开始，大于 1 的值与一个较新的时代相关联。

trans-unit.source: A value indicating that looping should continue indefinitely rather than complete after a specific number of loops.
trans-unit.target: 表示在特定的循环次数后,循环应该无限期地继续下去,而不是完成。

trans-unit.source: A value indicating the resource manager's vote on the outcome of the transaction. The possible values are: XA_RDONLY or XA_OK. If the resource manager wants to roll back the transaction, it should do so by raising an appropriate XAException in the prepare method.
trans-unit.target: 表示资源管理人对交易结果的投票的数值。可能的值是:XA_RDONLY或XA_OK。如果资源管理器想撤销交易,应该在准备方法中引发一个适当的XAException。

trans-unit.source: A value layout.
trans-unit.target: 一个价值布局。

trans-unit.source: A value layout. A value layout is used to model the memory layout associated with values of basic data types, such as integral types (either signed or unsigned) and floating-point types. Each value layout has a size and a byte order (see ByteOrder).
trans-unit.target: 价值布局。值布局用于对与基本数据类型（例如，整数类型（有符号或无符号）和浮点类型）的值相关联的内存布局进行建模。每个值布局都有一个大小和一个字节顺序（请参见 ByteOrder ）。

trans-unit.source: A value of "true" indicates namespace URIs and unprefixed local names for element and attribute names will be available.
trans-unit.target: 值为 "true "表示可以使用命名空间URI以及元素和属性名称的无前缀本地名称。

trans-unit.source: A value of "true" indicates that XML qualified names (with prefixes) and attributes (including xmlns* attributes) will be available.
trans-unit.target: 值为“ true”表示XML限定名称（带有前缀）和属性（包括xmlns *属性）将可用。

trans-unit.source: A value of "true" indicates that system IDs in declarations will be absolutized (relative to their base URIs) before reporting. (That is the default behavior for all SAX2 XML parsers.) A value of "false" indicates those IDs will not be absolutized; parsers will provide the base URI from Locator.getSystemId(). This applies to system IDs passed in
trans-unit.target: 值为“ true”表示声明之前，声明中的系统ID是绝对的（相对于其基本URI）。（这是所有SAX2 XML解析器的默认行为。）值“ false”表示这些ID将不被使用；解析器将从Locator.getSystemId（）提供基本URI 。这适用于传入的系统ID

trans-unit.source: A value of "true" indicates that the LexicalHandler will report the beginning and end of parameter entities.
trans-unit.target: 值为 "true "表示LexicalHandler将报告参数实体的开始和结束。

trans-unit.source: A value of -1 for the ending point indicates the last tick of the sequence. Otherwise, the ending point must be greater than or equal to the starting point, and it must fall within the size of the loaded sequence.
trans-unit.target: 结束点的值为-1,表示序列的最后一个刻度。否则,结束点必须大于或等于起始点,并且必须在加载序列的大小范围内。

trans-unit.source: A value of -1 indicates "cache forever".
trans-unit.target: 值为-1表示 "永远缓存"。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 causes no changes to the debugging options.
trans-unit.target: 值为0时,调试选项不会改变。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 for the starting point means the beginning of the loaded sequence. The starting point must be lower than or equal to the ending point, and it must fall within the size of the loaded sequence.
trans-unit.target: 起始点的值为0,意味着加载序列的开始,起始点必须小于或等于结束点,并且必须在加载序列的大小之内。起始点必须小于或等于结束点,并且必须在加载序列的大小范围内。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 implies that the path can only contain a single certificate. A value of -1 implies that the path length is unconstrained (i.e. there is no maximum). The default maximum path length, if not specified, is 5. Setting a value less than -1 will cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 值为 0 意味着路径只能包含一张证书,值为-1 意味着路径长度不受限制(即没有最大值)。值为-1意味着路径长度不受限制(即没有最大值),如果没有指定,默认的最大路径长度为5。如果没有指定,默认的最大路径长度是 5,设置一个小于 -1 的值会引起异常。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates "never cache". A value of -1 indicates "cache forever".
trans-unit.target: 值为0表示 "永不缓存"。值为-1表示 "永远缓存"。

trans-unit.source: A value of EXECUTE_FAILED -- indicates that the command failed to execute successfully and occurs only if a driver continues to process commands after a command fails
trans-unit.target: 值 EXECUTE_FAILED -表示命令执行失败，仅当驱动程序在命令失败后继续处理命令时才会发生

trans-unit.source: A value of SUCCESS_NO_INFO -- indicates that the command was processed successfully but that the number of rows affected is unknown
trans-unit.target: SUCCESS_NO_INFO 的值-表示命令已成功处理，但受影响的行数未知

trans-unit.source: A value of false is useful when the visibility of components is dynamically adjusted and you don't want surrounding components and the sizing to change.
trans-unit.target: 当动态调整组件的可见性并且您不希望更改周围的组件和尺寸时， false 值很有用。

trans-unit.source: A value of null can be used to set the look and feel to null. As the LookAndFeel is required for most of Swing to function, setting the LookAndFeel to null is strongly discouraged.
trans-unit.target: 的值 null ，可以用来设置外观和感觉 null 。由于 LookAndFeel 都需要对大多数Swing的运行，设置 LookAndFeel 到 null 的强烈反对。

trans-unit.target: 的值 null 为 sourceRegion 将删除任何区域规范，引起要使用的整个图像。

trans-unit.source: A value of true denotes that JavaBeans should behave in design time mode, a value of false denotes runtime behavior.

trans-unit.target: 一个变量的字节码范围至少与该变量的作用域一样大,但在某些情况下可以延续到作用域结束之后。

trans-unit.source: A vector of Integer objects containing all the identifiers of timer notifications with the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 一个 Integer 对象的向量，其中包含具有指定 type 的计时器通知的所有标识符。

trans-unit.source: A vector of Integer objects containing all the timer notification identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含所有计时器通知标识符的 Integer 对象向量。

trans-unit.source: A vendor can register a SyncProvider implementation class name with Oracle Corporation by sending email to jdbc@sun.com. Oracle will maintain a database listing the available SyncProvider implementations for use with compliant RowSet implementations. This database will be similar to the one already maintained to list available JDBC drivers.
trans-unit.target: 供应商可以通过将电子邮件发送到jdbc@sun.com向Oracle Corporation注册 SyncProvider 实现类名称。Oracle将维护一个数据库，其中列出了可用的 SyncProvider 实现，以与兼容的 RowSet 实现一起使用。该数据库将类似于已经维护的数据库，以列出可用的JDBC驱动程序。

trans-unit.source: A version number never has trailing zero elements. If an element and all those that follow it logically have the value zero then all of them are omitted.
trans-unit.target: 一个版本号永远不会有尾部为零的元素。如果一个元素和它后面的所有元素在逻辑上的值都是零,那么所有的元素都会被省略。

trans-unit.source: A version of AbstractQueuedSynchronizer in which synchronization state is maintained as a long.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AbstractQueuedSynchronizer 版本，其中同步状态保持为 long 。

trans-unit.source: A version of AbstractQueuedSynchronizer in which synchronization state is maintained as a long. This class has exactly the same structure, properties, and methods as AbstractQueuedSynchronizer with the exception that all state-related parameters and results are defined as long rather than int. This class may be useful when creating synchronizers such as multilevel locks and barriers that require 64 bits of state.
trans-unit.target: 一个 AbstractQueuedSynchronizer 版本，其中同步状态保持为 long 。此类具有与 AbstractQueuedSynchronizer 完全相同的结构，属性和方法，除了所有与状态相关的参数和结果均定义为 long 而不是 int 。当创建需要64位状态的同步器（如多级锁和屏障）时，此类可能很有用。

trans-unit.source: A version string 10-ea matches $VNUM = "10" and $PRE = "ea". The version string 10+-ea matches $VNUM = "10" and $OPT = "ea".
trans-unit.target: 版本字符串 10-ea 与 $VNUM = "10" 和 $PRE = "ea" 匹配。版本字符串 10+-ea 匹配 $VNUM = "10" 和 $OPT = "ea" 。

trans-unit.source: A version string has three components: The version number itself, an optional pre-release version, and an optional build version. Each component is a sequence of tokens; each token is either a non-negative integer or a string. Tokens are separated by the punctuation characters '.', '-', or '+', or by transitions from a sequence of digits to a sequence of characters that are neither digits nor punctuation characters, or vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 版本字符串包含三个组成部分：版本号本身，可选的预发行版本和可选的构建版本。每个组件都是一个令牌序列。每个令牌可以是非负整数或字符串。标记以标点符号 '.' 分隔。， '-' 或 '+' ，或从数字序列到既不是数字又不是标点符号的字符序列过渡，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: A version with a pre-release identifier is always considered to be less than a version without one. Pre-release identifiers are compared numerically when they consist only of digits, and lexicographically otherwise. Numeric identifiers are considered to be less than non-numeric identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 有发行前标识符的版本总是被认为比没有发行前标识符的版本少。当发行前的标识符只由数字组成时,就会进行数字上的比较,否则就会进行词法上的比较。数字标识符被认为比非数字标识符少。

trans-unit.source: A version without a build number is always less than one with a build number; otherwise build numbers are compared numerically.
trans-unit.target: 没有build号的版本总是小于有build号的版本,否则build号是用数字比较的。

trans-unit.source: A vertical offset to be applied to the subsampling grid before subsampling.
trans-unit.target: 在子采样之前,要应用于子采样网格的垂直偏移。

trans-unit.source: A vertical offset to be applied to the subsampling grid before subsampling. The first pixel to be used will be offset this amount from the origin of the region, or of the image if no region is specified.
trans-unit.target: 子采样前应用于子采样网格的垂直偏移量。要使用的第一个像素将从区域的原点偏移这个数量,如果没有指定区域,则从图像的原点偏移这个数量。

trans-unit.source: A vertical scrollbar's preferred width is the maximum of preferred widths of the (non null) increment/decrement buttons, and the minimum width of the thumb.
trans-unit.target: 垂直滚动条的首选宽度是（非 null ）增加/减少按钮的首选宽度的最大值，以及拇指的最小宽度。

trans-unit.source: A vertical scrollbar's preferred width is the maximum of preferred widths of the (non null) increment/decrement buttons, and the minimum width of the thumb. The preferred height is the sum of the preferred heights of the same parts. The basis for the preferred size of a horizontal scrollbar is similar.
trans-unit.target: 垂直滚动条的首选宽度是（非 null ）增加/减少按钮的首选宽度的最大值，以及拇指的最小宽度。优选高度是相同部分的优选高度的总和。水平滚动条的首选大小的依据与此类似。

trans-unit.source: A vertical whitespace character: [\n\x0B\f\r\x85\u2028\u2029]
trans-unit.target: 垂直空格字符： [\n\x0B\f\r\x85\u2028\u2029]

trans-unit.source: A very important part of the text package is the View class.
trans-unit.target: 文本包的一个非常重要的部分是 View 类。

trans-unit.source: A very important part of the text package is the View class. As the name suggests it represents a view of the text model, or a piece of the text model. It is this class that is responsible for the look of the text component. The view is not intended to be some completely new thing that one must learn, but rather is much like a lightweight component.
trans-unit.target: 文本包的一个非常重要的部分是 View 类。顾名思义，它表示文本模型的视图或文本模型的一部分。此类负责文本组件的外观。该视图并不是要成为必须学习的全新事物，而很像是一个轻量级的组件。

trans-unit.source: A view buffer is indexed not in terms of bytes but rather in terms of the type-specific size of its values;
trans-unit.target: 视图缓冲区的索引不是以字节为单位,而是以其值的特定类型大小为单位。

trans-unit.source: A view buffer is potentially much more efficient because it will be direct if, and only if, its backing byte buffer is direct.
trans-unit.target: 视图缓冲区的效率可能要高得多,因为只有当它的支持字节缓冲区是直接的时,它才会是直接的。

trans-unit.source: A view buffer provides relative bulk
trans-unit.target: 视图缓冲区提供了相对批量

trans-unit.source: A view has the following responsibilities:
trans-unit.target: 观点具有以下责任:

trans-unit.source: A view implementation to display a block (as a box) with CSS specifications.
trans-unit.target: 用CSS规范显示块(作为盒子)的视图实现。

trans-unit.source: A view implementation to display an html list
trans-unit.target: 一个显示html列表的视图实现

trans-unit.source: A view of a ConcurrentHashMap as a Set of keys, in which additions may optionally be enabled by mapping to a common value.
trans-unit.target: ConcurrentHashMap作为一 Set 键的视图，其中可以选择通过映射到公共值来启用添加。

trans-unit.source: A view of a ConcurrentHashMap as a Set of keys, in which additions may optionally be enabled by mapping to a common value. This class cannot be directly instantiated. See keySet(), keySet(V), newKeySet(), newKeySet(int).
trans-unit.target: ConcurrentHashMap作为一 Set 键的视图，其中可以选择通过映射到公共值来启用添加。此类不能直接实例化。参见 keySet() ， keySet(V) ， newKeySet() ， newKeySet(int) 。

trans-unit.source: A view of a ConcurrentHashMap as a Set of keys, in which additions may optionally be enabled by mapping to a common value. This class cannot be directly instantiated. See keySet(), keySet(V), newKeySet(), newKeySet(int).
trans-unit.target: ConcurrentHashMap作为一 Set 键的视图，其中可以选择通过映射到公共值来启用添加。此类不能直接实例化。参见 keySet() ， keySet(V) ， newKeySet() ， newKeySet(int) 。

trans-unit.source: A view that arranges its children into a box shape by tiling its children along an axis.
trans-unit.target: 视图通过沿着轴线将其子代排列成一个盒子形状。

trans-unit.source: A view that arranges its children into a box shape by tiling its children along an axis. The box is somewhat like that found in TeX where there is alignment of the children, flexibility of the children is considered, etc. This is a building block that might be useful to represent things like a collection of lines, paragraphs, lists, columns, pages, etc. The axis along which the children are tiled is considered the major axis. The orthogonal axis is the minor axis.
trans-unit.target: 视图通过沿着轴线将其子代排列成一个盒子形状。盒子有点像TeX中的盒子,其中考虑到了子代的对齐和子代的灵活性等。这是一个构建模块,可能对表示诸如行、段落、列表、列、页等的集合很有用。沿着子代平铺的轴被认为是主轴。正交轴是小轴。

trans-unit.source: A virtual machine targeted for debugging.
trans-unit.target: 一个针对调试的虚拟机。

trans-unit.source: A virtual machine targeted for debugging. More precisely, a mirror representing the composite state of the target VM. All other mirrors are associated with an instance of this interface. Access to all other mirrors is achieved directly or indirectly through an instance of this interface. Access to global VM properties and control of VM execution are supported directly by this interface.
trans-unit.target: 用于调试的虚拟机。更准确地说，是代表目标VM的复合状态的 mirror 。所有其他镜像都与此接口的实例相关联。通过此接口的实例，可以直接或间接实现对所有其他镜像的访问。此接口直接支持对全局VM属性的访问和对VM执行的控制。

trans-unit.source: A virtual machine which searches for classes through paths
trans-unit.target: 一个通过路径搜索类的虚拟机。

trans-unit.target: 可见字符： [\p{Alnum}\p{Punct}]

trans-unit.target: 一个可见的字符： [^\p{IsWhite_Space}\p{gc=Cc}\p{gc=Cs}\p{gc=Cn}]

trans-unit.source: A visitor of files.
trans-unit.target: 文件的访客。

trans-unit.source: A visitor of files. An implementation of this interface is provided to the Files.walkFileTree methods to visit each file in a file tree.
trans-unit.target: 文件的访问者。向 Files.walkFileTree 方法提供此接口的实现，以访问文件树中的每个文件。

trans-unit.source: A visitor of files. An implementation of this interface is provided to the Files.walkFileTree methods to visit each file in a file tree.
trans-unit.target: 文件的访问者。向 Files.walkFileTree 方法提供此接口的实现，以访问文件树中的每个文件。

trans-unit.source: A visitor of module directives, in the style of the visitor design pattern.
trans-unit.target: 模块指令的访问者,采用访问者设计模式的风格。

trans-unit.source: A visitor of module directives, in the style of the visitor design pattern. Classes implementing this interface are used to operate on a directive when the kind of directive is unknown at compile time. When a visitor is passed to a directive's accept method, the visitXyz method applicable to that directive is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 访客设计模式样式的模块指令的访客。当指令的种类在编译时未知时，用于实现此接口的类可用于对指令进行操作。当将访问者传递给指令的 accept 方法时，将调用适用于该指令的 visitXyz 方法。

trans-unit.source: A visitor of program elements based on their kind with default behavior appropriate for source versions RELEASE_9 through RELEASE_11.
trans-unit.target: 基于程序元素种类的访问者，其默认行为适用于源版本 RELEASE_9 至 RELEASE_11 。

trans-unit.source: A visitor of program elements based on their kind with default behavior appropriate for source versions RELEASE_9 through RELEASE_11. For elementsXyz that may have more than one kind, the visitXyz methods in this class delegate to the visitXyzAsKind method corresponding to the first argument's kind. The visitXyzAsKind methods call defaultAction, passing their arguments to defaultAction's corresponding parameters.
trans-unit.target: 基于程序元素种类的访问者，其默认行为适用于源版本 RELEASE_9 至 RELEASE_11 。对于可能具有不止一种类型的元素 Xyz ，此类中的 visitXyz 方法委托给第一个参数类型对应的 visitXyzAsKind 方法。在 visitXyzAsKind 方法调用 defaultAction 的，并将其参数传递给 defaultAction 的的相应参数。

trans-unit.source: A visitor of the values of annotation type elements, using a variant of the visitor design pattern. Unlike a standard visitor which dispatches based on the concrete type of a member of a type hierarchy, this visitor dispatches based on the type of data stored; there are no distinct subclasses for storing, for example, boolean values versus int values. Classes implementing this interface are used to operate on a value when the type of that value is unknown at compile time. When a visitor is passed to a value's accept method, the visitXyz method applicable to that value is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 注释类型元素的值的访问者，使用访问者设计模式的变体。与标准访问者根据类型层次结构成员的具体类型进行调度不同，该访问者根据存储的数据类型进行调度；没有用于存储例如 boolean 值与 int 值的不同子类。当在编译时不知道该值的类型时，可使用实现此接口的类对一个值进行操作。将访问者传递给值的 accept 方法时，将调用适用于该值的 visitXyz 方法。

trans-unit.source: A warning message
trans-unit.target: 警告信息

trans-unit.source: A watch key has a state. When initially created the key is said to be ready. When an event is detected then the key is signalled and queued so that it can be retrieved by invoking the watch service's poll or take methods. Once signalled, a key remains in this state until its reset method is invoked to return the key to the ready state. Events detected while the key is in the signalled state are queued but do not cause the key to be re-queued for retrieval from the watch service. Events are retrieved by invoking the key's pollEvents method. This method retrieves and removes all events accumulated for the object. When initially created, a watch key has no pending events. Typically events are retrieved when the key is in the signalled state leading to the following idiom:
trans-unit.target: 监视键具有状态。最初创建密钥时，据说已经准备好了。当检测到事件时，该密钥会发出信号并排队，以便可以通过调用监视服务的 poll 或 take 方法来检索它。发出信号后，密钥将保持在此状态，直到调用其 reset 方法以将密钥返回到就绪状态为止。当按键处于发信号状态时检测到的事件会排队，但不会导致按键重新排队以便从监视服务中检索。通过调用键的 pollEvents 检索事件方法。此方法检索并删除为该对象累积的所有事件。最初创建时，监视键没有未决事件。通常，当键处于发信号状态并导致以下习惯用法时，才检索事件：

Events detected while the key is in the signalled state are queued but do not cause the key to be re-queued for retrieval from the watch service. trans-unit.source: A watch key is created when a watchable object is registered with a watch service. The key remains valid until:
trans-unit.target: 当将可监视对象注册到监视服务时，将创建监视键。该密钥一直 valid 直到：

trans-unit.source: A watch key is valid upon creation and remains until it is cancelled, or its watch service is closed.
trans-unit.target: 一把手表钥匙在创建时就有效,并一直保持到它被取消,或其手表服务被关闭。

trans-unit.source: A watch service is safe for use by multiple concurrent consumers. To ensure that only one consumer processes the events for a particular object at any time then care should be taken to ensure that the key's reset method is only invoked after its events have been processed. The close method may be invoked at any time to close the service causing any threads waiting to retrieve keys, to throw ClosedWatchServiceException.
trans-unit.target: 监视服务可以安全地供多个并发使用者使用。为了确保只有一个使用者在任何时候都可以处理特定对象的事件，因此应注意确保仅在键的事件被处理后才调用该键的 reset 方法。该 close 方法可随时调用关闭导致等待获取密钥的任何线程，扔服务 ClosedWatchServiceException 。

trans-unit.source: A watch service is safe for use by multiple concurrent consumers. To ensure that only one consumer processes the events for a particular object at any time then care should be taken to ensure that the key's reset method is only invoked after its events have been processed. The close method may be invoked at any time to close the service causing any threads waiting to retrieve keys, to throw ClosedWatchServiceException.
trans-unit.target: 监视服务可以安全地供多个并发使用者使用。为确保在任何时候只有一个使用者处理特定对象的事件，则应注意确保仅在键的事件已处理后才调用该键的 reset 方法。该 close 方法可随时调用关闭导致等待获取密钥的任何线程，扔服务 ClosedWatchServiceException 。

trans-unit.source: A watch service that watches registered objects for changes and events.
trans-unit.target: 手表服务，手表已注册的对象的变化和事件。

trans-unit.source: A watch service that watches registered objects for changes and events. For example a file manager may use a watch service to monitor a directory for changes so that it can update its display of the list of files when files are created or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 手表服务，手表已注册的对象的变化和事件。例如，文件管理器可以使用监视服务来监视目录的更改，以便在创建或删除文件时可以更新其对文件列表的显示。

trans-unit.source: A web server should return an HTTP 404 (Not Found) response when a requested resource does not exist. Sometimes, however, web servers are erroneously configured to return an HTTP 200 (OK) response along with a helpful HTML error page in such cases. This will cause a ServiceConfigurationError to be thrown when this class attempts to parse the HTML page as a provider-configuration file. The best solution to this problem is to fix the misconfigured web server to return the correct response code (HTTP 404) along with the HTML error page.
trans-unit.target: 当请求的资源不存在时，Web服务器应返回HTTP 404（未找到）响应。但是，在某些情况下，有时会将Web服务器错误地配置为返回HTTP 200（OK）响应以及有用的HTML错误页面。当此类尝试将HTML页面解析为提供程序配置文件时，这将引发 ServiceConfigurationError 。解决此问题的最佳方法是修复配置错误的Web服务器，以返回正确的响应代码（HTTP 404）和HTML错误页面。

trans-unit.source: A week is defined by:
trans-unit.target: 一周的定义是:

trans-unit.source: A well formed END_ELEMENT tag is written. The name is written by looking up the prefix for the namespace uri. The writer can be configured to respect prefixes of QNames. If the writer is respecting prefixes it must use the prefix set on the QName. The default behavior is to lookup the value for the prefix on the EventWriter's internal namespace context. If the END_ELEMENT name does not match the START_ELEMENT name an XMLStreamException is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 写出一个成型的END_ELEMENT标签。名字是通过查找命名空间 uri 的前缀来写的。编写者可以被配置为尊重QNames的前缀。如果写入者尊重前缀,它必须使用QName上设置的前缀。默认的行为是在EventWriter的内部命名空间上下文中查找前缀的值。如果END_ELEMENT的名称与START_ELEMENT的名称不匹配,就会产生一个XMLStreamException。

trans-unit.source: A well-formed locale key has the form [0-9a-zA-Z]{2}. A well-formed locale type has the form "" | [0-9a-zA-Z]{3,8} ('-' [0-9a-zA-Z]{3,8})* (it can be empty, or a series of subtags 3-8 alphanums in length). A well-formed locale attribute has the form [0-9a-zA-Z]{3,8} (it is a single subtag with the same form as a locale type subtag).
trans-unit.target: 格式正确的语言环境密钥的格式为 [0-9a-zA-Z]{2} 。格式正确的语言环境类型的格式为 "" | [0-9a-zA-Z]{3,8} ('-' [0-9a-zA-Z]{3,8})* （可以为空，也可以为其中的一系列子标记3-8字母数字长度）。格式正确的语言环境属性的格式为 [0-9a-zA-Z]{3,8} （它是一个单个子标签，其形式与语言环境类型子标签相同）。

trans-unit.source: A wheel mouse is a mouse which has a wheel in place of the middle button. This wheel can be rotated towards or away from the user. Mouse wheels are most often used for scrolling, though other uses are possible.
trans-unit.target: 滚轮鼠标是一种用滚轮代替中间按钮的鼠标。这个滚轮可以朝向或远离用户旋转。鼠标滚轮最常用于滚动,但也可用于其他用途。

trans-unit.source: A whitespace character: [ \t\n\x0B\f\r]
trans-unit.target: 空格字符： [ \t\n\x0B\f\r]

trans-unit.source: A whitespace character: \p{IsWhite_Space}
trans-unit.target: 空格字符： \p{IsWhite_Space}

trans-unit.target: 空格字符： \p{IsWhite_Space}
